Name: LU 476 - Zoning, EAST 147TH STREET REZONING, Bronx (C160251 ZMX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 160251 ZMX, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 476).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: September 28, 2016 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Land Use Calendar - Week of October 3, 2016 - October 7, 2016
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - October 27, 2016

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 9, 2016 its decision dated September 7, 2016 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by MLK Plaza, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6c, to change an M1-2 and an M1-3 District to an R7X District and establish within the R7X District a C1-4 District to facilitate the development of a new 165-unit affordable housing building in the Mott Haven neighborhood in the Bronx, (ULURP No. C 160251 ZMX), Community District 1,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of the Bronx \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application C 160250 ZMX (L.U. No. 475), a zoning text amendment pursuant to Appendix F to establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Designated Area;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 5, 2016;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 16DCP154X) issued on May 9, 2016 which includes an (E) Designation (E-385) relating to air quality, noise and hazardous material impacts (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 160251 ZMX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 6c:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\cf1\par
1. \tab changing from an M1-2 District to an R7X District property bounded by Southern Boulevard, a line perpendicular to the southeasterly street line of Southern Boulevard distant 275 feet northeasterly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the southeasterly street line of Southern Boulevard and the northeasterly street line of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street, Austin Place, East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street, Timpson Place, and a line 100 feet southwesterly of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj 2. \tab changing from an M1-3 District to an R7X District property bounded by Timpson Place, East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street, Austin Place, and a line 100 feet southwesterly of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street; and \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj 3.\tab establishing within a proposed R7X District a C1-4 District bounded by Southern Boulevard, a line perpendicular to the southeasterly street line of Southern Boulevard distant 275 feet northeasterly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the southeasterly street line of Southern Boulevard and the northeasterly street line of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line midway between Southern Boulevard and Timpson Place, and a line 100 feet southwesterly of East 147\super th\nosupersub  Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 9, 2016, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-385\cf0 , Community District 1, Borough of the Bronx. \cf1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi4\li-4\qj\tx720\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on October 27, 2016, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
